title: DJI's Black Friday Sale: Up to 30% Off Drones and Cameras
originSummary: DJI is offering Black Friday deals on drones and cameras, with discounts of up to 30%.
Customers can take advantage of the discounts to purchase DJI's high-quality and innovative drones and cameras.
The Black Friday sale provides an opportunity for drone enthusiasts and photography enthusiasts to upgrade their equipment at a discounted price.

title: Thales Australia and Revolution Aerospace Partner to Connect Regional Communities with Cutting-Edge Drones
originSummary: Thales Australia and Revolution Aerospace are collaborating to create advanced drone solutions to connect remote communities in Australia.

The project is supported by the government's Emerging Aviation Technologies Partnership Program and will involve the development of a drone-based regional cargo delivery system with increased cargo capacity.
Thales and Revolution Aerospace are also working on an Uncrewed Traffic Management system to safely integrate the drone solution into the national airspace.
The goal of the project is to enhance connectivity for regional communities and improve access to essential products and services, including medical supplies.
A major trial is planned for the Whitsunday region in early 2024 to demonstrate the successful operation of the drone solutions.

title: Rep. Leger Fernández pushes for heat-sensing tech to prevent wildfires
originSummary: Rep. Teresa Leger Fernández is advocating for the use of infrared drones by the U.S. Forest Service during prescribed burns to prevent wildfires.
Leger Fernández claims that the Forest Service initially agreed to use the drones but has now stated they do not have enough drones for every fire.
Infrared technology can detect heat even without smoke, making it a valuable tool for monitoring and preventing fires.
Leger Fernández has written a letter to Forest Service Chief Randy Moore, urging the use of drones and the need to rebuild trust with affected communities.

The Forest Service has acknowledged receiving the letter and mentioned that while not all drones have infrared capability, they are actively using various technologies to obtain infrared images during prescribed burns.
Leger Fernández's letter includes questions about the Forest Service's use of infrared drones and the funding needed to ensure sufficient drones and trained personnel.

title: AutoFlight Unveils Electric VTOL Firefighting Drone
originSummary: AutoFlight has introduced its electric VTOL firefighting program and prototype drone, designed to combat fires from the air.
The modified drone can carry four 100 kg fire-extinguishing canisters and can achieve speeds of over 200 km per hour.
AutoFlight aims to obtain certification from the CAAC in 2022 and will engage with clients and development partners to improve and bring the prototype to market.

title: Operation Memphis Guardian: Drones combat gang violence, enhance safety
originSummary: Drone Security has initiated Operation Memphis Guardian to combat rising violence and improve safety in Shelby Forest-Frayser, Memphis.
High-resolution camera-equipped drones will perform live surveillance in the most affected areas between midnight and 6 a.m.
The objective is to reduce gang violence and offer protection for the local residents, with community support encouraged via a GoFundMe campaign.

title: Marut Drones Launches Seedcopter 2.0 for Corporate Reforestation Efforts
originSummary: Hyderabad-based drone maker Marut Drones has introduced the Seedcopter 2.0, India's first reforestation drone.
The drone is now accessible to corporate entities for CSR activities and reforestation projects.
Marut Drones has already used the Seedcopter 2.0 as part of its 'Hara Bahara campaign' and successfully planted over 1 crore trees across nine states in 2022.
